column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We paid quite a lot for the 12 hour short ribs
column3: and the pulled pork Hush puppies. They sounded great on paper. But when we got the food there was an odd taste to everything and the short ribs were more of a tasting than an actual entree (very small portion). I think they were trying to hard to be fancy or something. It did not work out...
